neko.commandDescription: Fetches a random neko girl (lewd if the channel is NSFW) and displays it.

reverse.noSentence: You have to give me something to reverse!

dog.commandDescription: Fetches a random dog and displays it. Woof!

invite.commandDescription: Shows the link to invite Switchblade to your server
invite.clickHere: Click here to invite me to your server
invite.noteThat: Note that you need the **$t(permissions:MANAGE_GUILD)** permission in order to invite bots.

ping.commandDescription: Checks if the bot is online

spotify.commandDescription: Searches for a song on Spotify
spotify.noTracksFound: I couldn't find any tracks with that name.
spotify.noTrackName: You need to give me a track name.

owo.missingSentence: You need to give me a sentence to owoify
owo.tooLongTitle: Your sentence is longer than 200 characters
owo.tooLongDescription: Try shortening your sentence down or separate it into multiple commands
